MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Buckhaven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:20pm. Our engineers have now arrived at the College Street substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:12pm on Sunday, 01 November 2020
